about_the_game:
FEAR: Call of the village is a first-person horror game made in realistic 3D graphics, immersing you in an atmosphere of horror and instilling fear. The gameplay involves collecting notes, solving riddles and running away from ghosts, as well as other mechanics inherent in any horror game.

In it you have to find yourself in a mysterious village and solve various riddles, the solution of which will be hampered by various phenomena unexplained by science. Also, to complete the game you will have to collect the necessary items that may be useful in the passage or will even be necessary. Meet the new main character, jump scares and plot!

Brief background:

The main character, an ordinary unremarkable guy, found himself in a rather strange abandoned village. At first glance, this place is not at all repulsive, and even “pleasant” to the eye, however, as he progresses, the main character encounters many ghosts and other otherworldly creatures and phenomena. Therefore, more and more, the cute village ceases to look like a cozy place, and every next minute spent in it convinces us that we need to quickly get out of this God-forsaken place!

You have to overcome your fear, going through gloomy locations as the main character, solving various puzzles along the way and trying to understand what is going on, how you got here, and most importantly, how to get out of this enchanted village.

By purchasing the game you will get the best emotions that you have never received before!
